author: IGN
description:
Tormented Souls 2 reviewed by Vikki Blake on PC, also available on PlayStation and Xbox.

If you're nostalgic for the survival horror games of old, Tormented Souls 2 can provide a modern-looking trip down memory lane, with all the good and bad that brings. It has a tense atmosphere to soak up and some gorgeously spooky locations to explore, but you’ll need to push through janky combat and a bit of backtracking to enjoy them. Its esoteric puzzles test your brainpower in a way that could sometimes frustrate, but will also delight anyone who missed smashing key items together to see what would happen. There's a lot to enjoy here, as well as plenty that perhaps should have remained in the past, but Tormented Souls 2 still manages to stand as an entertaining callback to the adventures that made contemporary horror gaming what it is.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Tormented Souls 2 Review

author: IGN
description:
Full Episode: https://youtu.be/TeJ4dmOOnb0

In the video game equivalent of Hell freezing over or pigs flying, the original Halo is coming to PlayStation. Halo: Campaign Evolved is a full Unreal Engine 5 overhaul of the 2001 Xbox original, and in honor of the 25th anniversary, it’s going multi-platform sometime next year. Nick got a chance to play it, and shared his impressions about new features, control changes, UI improvements, and more, as well as some of the stuff we don’t know, like how four-player coop will change the experience, or when the actual release date is. Beyond!

This weeks show was Max Scoville, Jada Griffin, Nick Maillet, and is produced by Tom Jorgensen

#gaming #playstation #halo
title: Pigs Fly and Hell Freezes as Halo Comes to PS5 - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
Check out gameplay from Halo: Campaign Evolved. This is a remake of the original Halo's campaign with a plethora of new features such as updated Unreal Engine 5 visuals, new voice performances from the games original voice actors, a sprint button, and a whole lot more. 

Halo: Campaign Evolved is headed to Xbox, PC, and PlayStation 5 sometime in 2026. 

Gameplay captured on an Xbox Series X.

#IGN #Gaming #Halo
title: Halo: Campaign Evolved | The Silent Cartographer Gameplay 4K

author: IGN
description:
Unlocked 712: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2e733K3YFLA

Ryan went on a field trip to Halo Studios and came back with hands-on impressions of Halo: Campaign Evolved, the newly announced Unreal Engine 5 remake of Halo: Combat Evolved. In this breakout from Unlocked 712, the crew discusses how the remake modernizes the original Xbox classic, what Unreal Engine 5 brings to the table, and what this means for the future of Halo on Xbox.

#xbox #Gaming #Halo
title: Halo 1 Remade in Unreal Engine 5 – How Does It Play?

author: IGN
description:
We played an early-in-development chunk of the classic Silent Cartographer mission in Halo: Campaign Evolved, the upcoming Unreal Engine 5 remake of Halo: Combat Evolved that's due out in 2026 for Xbox, PC, and yes, PlayStation 5. It's not quite a 1:1 remake though, so IGN's veteran of every Halo battle, Ryan McCaffrey, is here to give you his first impressions and tell you about what's new and what's been changed.

#IGN #Gaming #Halo
title: Halo: Campaign Evolved Is a Pretty Remake Coming to PS5, but Not an Exact One

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Behind the Scenes ViDoc for Halo: Campaign Evolved, a remake and reimagining of the iconic first-person sci-fi shooter Halo: Combat Evolved, developed by Halo Studios. Join Brian Jarrard, Greg Hermann, Dan Gniady, and Max Szlagor as they discuss the development of this new era for Halo. Halo: Campaign Evolved marks the return to the Halo ringworld that sets out to retain the original feel while evolving the franchise to accommodate new players and platforms alike. Learn more about the new features and details being added to Halo: Campaign Evolved, launching in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming #Halo
title: Halo: Campaign Evolved - Official Behind the Scenes ViDoc

Players will return to the start in a whole new way with additions, refinements, and features suited for the modern era, powered by Unreal Engine 5. Embark on the classic adventure as Master Chief to aid humanity against Covenant forces alongside Cortana to reveal a deep, sinister truth of the ringworld of Halo and protect the galaxy from imminent doom. Halo: Campaign Evolved is launching in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

author: IGN
description:
Six unique companions are ready to join your journey in The Outer Worlds 2, each bringing their own abilities, factions, and personalities to your crew. From the loyal tinkerer Niles Abara to the mysterious “Order math assassin” Marisol Delgado, here’s how to find and recruit every companion in the game, along with details on their special skills and quests.

Recruiting the right team isn’t just about firepower — it’s also about synergy, exploration perks, and unlocking some of the best story content The Outer Worlds 2 has to offer.

00:00 Intro
00:32 Niles Abara
01:48 Valerie
03:23 Inez Silang
05:13 Tristan Rao
06:36 Marisol Delgado
08:01 Aza Leitinger

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Outer Worlds 2 - All Companion Locations and How to Recruit Them

author: IGN
description:
Valerie is one of the first companions in The Outer Worlds 2 after getting past the intro and landing on Paradise Island. She’s very handy to have around, as she’ll provide you with extra healing, but her first companion quest is a bit different than the others, since she’s a robot. Here’s how to find enough Advanced Decryption Keys, open the lock box, and unlock Valerie’s first upgrade as soon as possible.
Timecodes:

00:00 - Intro
00:56 - Key 1 - Drone Quest
01:15 - Key 2 - Spire Grove 1
02:28 - Key 3 - Spire Grove 2
02:37 - Key 4 - Fisherman Ludwig's Hut
02:54 - Key 5 - Purchase From Arthur Cromby
03:00 - Key 6 & 7 - Purchase From Hazel In Automech Repair Center
03:44 - Valerie's Upgrades

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Outer Worlds 2 - Upgrade Valerie ASAP (Advanced Decryption Keys For Lockbox)

author: IGN
description:
From Ninja Gaiden’s earliest 2D entries, to Ryu's critically acclaimed foray into 3D, the Ninja Gaiden series has hacked and slashed its way to the top of the hyper-violent, AKA fun, action games genre. While countless ninja games have been released since the NES original, what is it that makes the Ninja Gaiden series still relevant after nearly 40 years?
In this episode of IGN Rewind, we’re going to take a look back on how this series found its core game design DNA, thanks to its early use of cinematics, narrative-driven gameplay, and innovation in difficult but rewarding challenges. 
This is the story of how Ninja Gaiden has kept its blade sharp and remains one of the most influential action series of all time. 
Written and produced by Nick Maillet
title: How Ninja Gaiden’s Razer Sharp Gameplay Still Influences Games Today - IGN Rewind

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch. This week Daemon, Max, and Ryan take a look at recent comments made by Xbox president Sarah Bond that liken the next-gen hybrid PC Xbox to a 'premium' experience. With the recent price hikes of the current-gen Series X and Series S, and the $1,000 price tag of the high-end ROG Xbox Ally X handheld, could the next Microsoft console sell for a higher price than the industry has ever seen? Is this even the right strategy for Xbox? Plus we have last week's poll results and a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Xbox Wants to Be the Rolls-Royce of Consoles - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'On The Set' LEGO Brickified Trailer for Wicked: For Good, the sequel to the theatrical version of the hit Broadway play, distributed by Universal Pictures. See the cast of Wicked: For Good in an all-new way with the latest LEGO Brickified Trailer. Wicked: For Good is in theaters on November 21.

Directed once again by award-winning director Jon M. Chu and starring the spectacular returning cast, led by Academy Award® nominated superstars Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande, the final chapter of the untold story of the witches of Oz begins with Elphaba and Glinda estranged and living with the consequences of their choices. 

Elphaba (Cynthia Erivo), now demonized as The Wicked Witch of the West, lives in exile, hidden within the Ozian forest while continuing her fight for the freedom of Oz’s silenced Animals and desperately trying to expose the truth she knows about The Wizard (Jeff Goldblum). 

Glinda, meanwhile, has become the glamorous symbol of Goodness for all of O
title: Wicked: For Good - Official LEGO Brickified Trailer (2025) Ariana Grande, Cynthia Erivo

01:01 - Gourdy #2 (Chapter 2)

03:47 - Gourdy #8 (Chapter 7)

You can head to IGN for more tips, tricks, and walkthroughs and read the Ninja Gaiden 4 wiki @ https://www.ign.com/wikis/ninja-gaiden-4

#IGN #Gaming

description: Don't miss 'The Federation Needs You' Update 1.7 Trailer for Starship Troopers: Extermination, a first-person tactical co-op shooter developed by Offworld. Players will take the fight to the galaxy on hostile planets to take on deadly bugs alone or with friends in co-op. A new update titled Echoes of Sparta is launching alongside version 1.7, packed with a new map, new Scorpion Bugs to dispatch, new perks, and more to defend humanity. Update 1.7 for Starship Troopers: Extermination is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.
